segments.text: Hello . This is the Holiday Inn . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . Is there a special rate for a group reservation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . There is a 20 % to 40 % discount . It depends on the season.During the summer the discount is 20 % . During the winter it is 40 % .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need five single rooms in October . How much of a discount can I get ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our summer season ended in September . So the discount will be 40 % . That ’ s a good deal . Would you prefer rooms with a front view or rear view ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What date and time will you be checking in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need you to send a deposit for 1/3 of the bill . You can send the check , or you can use the credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I ’ ll send a check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me your name , address and phone number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . My name is Anderson . My address is 109 Ferguson East , Holton . And my phone number is 309 789 1267 .
segments.speaker: S2
